0.text: Problems Everywhere. Here's something most people never realize: the world is full of problems waiting to be solved. Every single day, everywhere you look, there are problems. Some are small, some are huge.

1.text: The Secret. The people who make the most money, have the most impact, and live the most interesting lives are the ones who get really good at solving problems. That's the secret.

2.text: Simple Problems. Someone's hungry? That's a problem. Make them food, problem solved. Small reward, but real value created. This is where everyone starts.

3.text: Medium Problems. A business needs a website? That's a bigger problem. Build it, problem solved. Bigger reward, more value created. Now you're moving up.

4.text: Hard Problems. A community needs better education? That's a hard problem. Solve it and you get massive reward, massive impact. The harder the problem you can solve, the bigger the reward. Simple as that.

0.text: The Old Way. Historically, solving hard problems required years of education, expensive degrees, and lucky opportunities. Only certain people got access. That was the old game, and the deck was stacked against most people.

1.text: Years of School. First you needed years of school. Then an expensive degree. Then you had to hope for a lucky opportunity. And maybe, just maybe, you could solve the problem. Most people never got that chance.

2.text: The New Way. AI changes everything. Now the path is shorter. You see a problem, you ask questions, you use AI, you build a solution. No fancy degree required. No waiting years.

3.text: The Real Skill. AI is like having access to all the world's knowledge. But knowledge alone doesn't solve problems. The real skill is knowing what questions to ask. That's what separates problem solvers from everyone else.

4.text: Infinitely Patient Teacher. Here's something beautiful: AI never gets tired of your questions. It never gets irritated. Ask it a thousand questions in a row and it doesn't care. For the first time in history, you have access to an infinitely patient teacher.

5.text: Your New Superpower. This is revolutionary. You can learn things faster, understand problems deeper, and build real solutions. All you need is curiosity and the willingness to ask questions. That's your new superpower.

0.text: Most People Stop Here. Most people ask one or two questions about something and think they understand it. They don't. They're swimming at the surface while the real insights are deep below.

1.text: Level 1: Why?. Let's say a business is struggling. Level one: Why is the business struggling? Answer: because they don't have enough customers. Most people would stop here. Not you.

2.text: Level 2: Why?. Level two: Why don't they have enough customers? Answer: because people don't know about them. We're going deeper. Keep asking.

3.text: Level 3: Why?. Level three: Why don't people know about them? Answer: because they have no online presence. Now we're starting to see the real problem.

4.text: Levels 4 & 5: Going Deeper. Levels four and five: Why no online presence? Because they don't know how to build one. Why not? Because it seems too technical and expensive. We're almost at the root.

5.text: Level 6: The Real Problem. Level six: Why does it seem too technical and expensive? Because they don't know about AI tools that make it easy and free. Now we've found a problem we can actually solve!

6.text: The Key Insight. If you can get just two or three levels deeper than most people, you're already ahead of ninety-nine percent of the world. Most people accept surface-level answers. You won't.
